sentences.en: "Daniel," Pat said, her voice harsh with urgency. "Come out here immediately."
sentences.cn: “丹尼尔，”帕特说道，她的嗓音因为急迫而有些沙哑，“马上出来。”

sentences.en: Do not be pressurized into making your decision immediately.
sentences.cn: 不要迫于压力马上做出决定。

sentences.en: He lit a half-cigarette and almost immediately put it out again.
sentences.cn: 他点燃半支香烟，但又马上把它熄灭了。

sentences.en: He retired immediately after the end of the war.
sentences.cn: 战争一结束他就退休了。

sentences.en: I received a certain amount of sympathy immediately after the attack.
sentences.cn: 遇袭之后，人们立即对我表示了些许同情。

sentences.en: Immediately I've done it I feel completely disgusted with myself.
sentences.cn: 我一做完那件事就对自己感到十分厌恶。

sentences.en: Immediately to our right the old German summer resort was awakening.
sentences.cn: 紧靠我们右面，古老的德国避暑胜地正在苏醒。

sentences.en: Immediately, Daniel cut in on Joanne's attempts at reassurance.
sentences.cn: 乔安妮刚要作保证，丹尼尔就把她打断了。

sentences.en: Listening to the scratchy recording, I recognized Walt Whitman immediately.
sentences.cn: 听到沙哑的录音，我立刻知道那是沃尔特·惠特曼。

sentences.en: Magistrates ordered his dog Samson to be put down immediately.
sentences.cn: 治安官们勒令立即将他的狗萨姆森杀掉。

sentences.en: Many areas in the country'sinterior are unable to report Aids cases immediately.
sentences.cn: 该国内地的很多地区无法即时报告艾滋病病例。

sentences.en: Mellors was preaching heresy and had to be immediately defrocked.
sentences.cn: 梅勒斯宣扬异端邪说，不得不立即免去其圣职。

sentences.en: Mix in the remaining ingredients and serve immediately.
sentences.cn: 拌入余下的食材，立即上桌。

sentences.en: She immediately started ringing round her friends and relatives.
sentences.cn: 她马上开始给亲戚朋友们打电话。

sentences.en: The group's debut album was immediately acclaimed a hip hop classic.
sentences.cn: 这个组合的首张专辑一经推出便被盛赞为嘻哈乐的经典之作。

sentences.en: The move was immediately challenged by two of the republics.
sentences.cn: 此项动议立即遭到其中两个共和国的反对。

sentences.en: The telephone rang, and he answered it immediately.
sentences.cn: 电话铃响了，他马上去接。

sentences.en: Those most immediately involved in the disaster will be given support.
sentences.cn: 灾害最直接受害者将获得援助。

sentences.en: Trembling, she put the phone down. It rang again almost immediately.
sentences.cn: 她颤抖着放下电话听筒，电话几乎立刻又响了起来。

words.tran_cn: 立即的；直接的；最接近的

trans.tran_cn: 立即，接近，直接地，紧接地
trans.tran_en: very soon before or after something
